## Bio

I am an assistant professor in quantitative methods for social science at [Universitas Negeri Yogyakarta](http://staffnew.uny.ac.id/staff/132319827). I obtained my [Bachelor of Psychology](https://psikologi.ugm.ac.id/sarjana-psikologi/) and [Master of Sociology](https://sosiologi.fisipol.ugm.ac.id/program-magister-reguler/) from Universitas Gadjah Mada, and obtained PhD from Institute for Social Change now becoming [Cathie Marsh Institute for Social Research, University of Manchester](https://www.cmi.manchester.ac.uk/). My research focus is twofold: how to teach next generation of social data science and examine happiness for pubic policy.
